extensions.name: Background
extensions.description: Creates a background for widgets. The properties are used to create the style of the widgets. The methods are used when the widgets have already been created.

extensions.name: Fancy RecyclerView 2
extensions.description: Based on the Android RecyclerView widget. This extension adds many functionalities of the RecyclerView for Kodular.

extensions.name: LinearMetrics
extensions.description: It allows to model an object that specifies the measurements for widgets whose parents are ZLinear Widgets.

extensions.name: Snap
extensions.description: This extension helps to establish a behavior similar to the ViewPager in the RecyclerView.

extensions.name: StackMetrics
extensions.description: It allows to model an object that specifies the measurements for widgets whose parents are ZStack Widgets.

extensions.name: ZAnimator
extensions.description: This extension allows animating components and widgets (RecyclerView Widgets).

extensions.name: ZButton
extensions.description: It allows to model a new button widget model.

extensions.name: ZCard
extensions.description: It allows to model a new card widget model.

extensions.name: ZImage
extensions.description: It allows to model a new image widget model.

extensions.name: ZLabel
extensions.description: It allows to model a new label widget model.

extensions.name: ZLinear
extensions.description: It allows to model a new linear widget model.

extensions.name: ZLottie
extensions.description: It allows to model a new lottie widget model.

extensions.name: ZStack
extensions.description: It allows to model a new stack widget model. Based on the Android RelativeLayout widget.

extensions.name: ZView
extensions.description: It allows to model a new widget model. The methods in this component can be applied in any widget.
